name: Featherlight HTML Minify
author: Zuziko

sections.description:
A featherlight plugin that Minifies HTML output for a faster loading website.

Features:
– No annoying settings to deal with.
– Install and automatically minify your HTML.
– Featherlight with only a few lines of code.

Caution

Use of this plugin may conflict with server based cache services, and I cannot support it’s use on those servers.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard:

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Featherlight HTML Minify”
  3. Install the “Featherlight HTML Minify” Plugin
  4. Activate “Featherlight HTML Minify” on the Plugins page

short_description: A featherlight plugin that Minifies HTML output for a faster loading website.
